docs.title: Welcome Verteilen Documentation
docs.text: Verteilen is a cluster computing application which provide friendly user interface to control with

docs.title: Application info
docs.text:
• Platform Support: Windows/Linux
  • Programming Language: Typescript
  • Framework: Electron, Vue, Vuetify
  • Author: Elly
  • Script: JS

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: You must join the verteilen dev team to access the source code

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
User below commands to setup the project folder

git clone https://github.com/Verteilen/Verteilen.git
cd Verteilen
bun install
bun dev

After the build is setup, you can use below commands to do sort of things

docs.title: Actions
docs.text:
Open electron debug mode with Hot reload

npm run dev

Host static web

npm run web

Open express server and hosting it as backend

npm run express

Compute node build

npm run build:node
npm run docker:node-f

Compute server build

npm run build:server
npm run docker:server-f

docs.title: Node Install
docs.text:
Install the nodejs module in the global for compute node\ use npm install the compute tool node

npm install -g verteilen_node
# use command ctn to start the client
verteilen_node

docs.title: Desktop App
docs.text:
In Release page

  • For windows user click .msi installation file,
  • For linux user click .deb installation file

docs.title: Docker Install
docs.text:
Here is the quick deploy for compute node docker container

docker run --restart=always -p 12080:12080 --name verteilen_node0 e87870823/verteilen_node

Here is the quick deploy for compute server docker container

docker run --restart=always -p 11080:11080 -p 11777:11777 --name verteilen_server0 e87870823/verteilen_server
